name: Penguin Jewel Drop
description: Penguin Games is proud to announce our latest game now available for your mobile device. If you like puzzle games with engaging visuals then you will love Jewel Drop.  Play alone or with your friends to see who can set the top score. The rules of Jewel Drop are as follows: To removed a block of jewels find a group where there at least 3 connected jewels of the same type next to each other.  If you are able to select a group fast enough - 3 times in a row will cause your screen to flash and turn on BONUS points for the next 5 seconds where any blocks you find will be worth twice the points.  Hope you enjoy playing.  More levels coming soon.
